title: Doctrine: Journal Insert-Only (Temporary)
summary: Temporary binding rule: journal artifacts are append-only until mutability policy is locked

payload.rule: Journal artifacts are append-only; no updates permitted

enforcement.error_message: Journal update policy is not locked. Use artifact.create to append new entries.

payload.future_unlock_condition: New Mutability Registry version explicitly allowing updates
unlock_requirements: Mutability Registry update (v2+) with explicit journal policy
Workflow updates to enforce new rules
KGB regression to verify no breakage
Master Joel approval per truth hierarchy

design_choice_deferred.option_A: Fully immutable (append-only) - preserves privacy, audit trail, prevents editing
design_choice_deferred.option_B: Editable - allows typo correction, content updates, improved UX
semantic_implications: Privacy model (can users delete/edit past reflections?)
Audit trail requirements (should journal history be preserved?)

user_impact.blocked_pattern: Attempting artifact.update on journal will fail with JOURNAL_MUTABILITY_UNDECIDED error
user_impact.recommended_pattern: Use artifact.create to append new journal entries
user_impact.correction_strategy: Create new journal artifact with corrected content, optionally link via parent_artifact_id

actions: Formalized Journal INSERT-ONLY rule as temporary doctrine
Updated NQxb_Artifact_Update_v1 workflow with JOURNAL_MUTABILITY_UNDECIDED error code
Created doctrine snapshot artifact for immutable reference
